## üéµ BloomeeTunes v2.18.2+189

### üì¶ Downloads

**Android APKs:**
- **Universal APK** - Works on all Android devices
- **ARM64** - Recommended for modern devices (2019+)

- **x86_64** - For Intel/AMD 64-bit devices
- **x86** - For Intel/AMD 32-bit devices

**Desktop Apps:**
- **Windows x64** - Windows 10/11 desktop version
- **Linux x64** - Linux desktop version

# DevStudio v1.2.2

## What's New

### üè™ Internal App Store - Complete Feature

The DevStudio App Store lets you browse, download, and install apps from the DevStudio ecosystem directly within the app.

#### üì± App Browsing
- Beautiful app cards with icons and version info
- App details page with all download variants
- Platform sections: Android, Windows, Linux
- Release notes for each app

#### üì• Download System
- Real-time download progress with circular ring around app icon
- Network speed display (KB/s, MB/s)
- Total download time shown after completion
- File existence check - skips if already downloaded
- Cancel ongoing downloads anytime
- Custom filename format: `AppName-v1.0.0-arch.apk`
- Downloads saved to `/storage/emulated/0/Download/DevStudio/`

#### üì≤ Installation & Updates
- Install APKs directly from the app
- Detects installed apps and shows current version
- Smart update detection - shows "Update" only when newer version available
- Auto-refresh installed version when app resumes
- Works with both release and debug builds

#### üéØ Smart Recommendations
- Detects your device architecture (ARM64, ARM32, x86)
- Shows "RECOMMENDED" badge for best variant
- Color-coded tags:
  - üü¢ Green: "Recommended for your device"
  - üîµ Blue: "Works on all devices" (Universal)
  - üî¥ Red: "Don't install on this device"

#### üé® Clean UI Design
- Compact header with inline status badges
- Circular progress ring around app icon during download
- "Installed ‚Ä¢ v2.18.2" status with variant info
- Clean asset tiles without redundant info
